data.taskTitle: Fix P3 priority validation error on suggested task creation
Fix P3 priority validation error on suggested task creation
data.approach: The bulk API at line 132-135 validates priority as numeric 0-4 but agents may send P-prefixed strings like P3. Will add normalization to strip P prefix and convert to number before validation.

suggestedTasks.title: Refactor Priority Validation Logic for Task Creation
suggestedTasks.description: Review and update task creation validation mechanism to handle priority assignments correctly. Specifically examine how P3 priority is being processed and ensure consistent error handling. Validate input validation rules in the task creation signal pathway to prevent unexpected error states.
suggestedTasks.reason: Discovered during investigation of task creation workflow

suggestedTasks.title: Add Comprehensive Priority Handling Unit Tests
suggestedTasks.description: Create a comprehensive test suite to validate task priority validation across different scenarios. Focus on edge cases involving suggested tasks, priority assignments, and error handling mechanisms. Ensure tests cover multiple priority levels and creation pathways.
suggestedTasks.reason: Lack of existing test coverage revealed during bug investigation

patterns: Validate priority assignments before task generation
gotchas: Priority validation can block task creation unexpectedly
